name: Paws
description:
Got a Leap Motion? 

It's one of those hand recognition input devices for PC. Look, not many people have one because no one makes games that use them and no one makes games that use them because no one has them. Catch 22.

We made a game for one.

You play a cat, waving your hands up and down in front of the screen to run and waggle your little paws at the world. You can also play it with your feet!

Have a leap motion? Download away!
